title: Garamond-ish
content:
[http://images.morrissey-solo.com/gallery/albums/userpics/DSCN1713.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018125933/http:/images.morrissey-solo.com/gallery/albums/userpics/DSCN1713.JPG "http://images.morrissey-solo.com/gallery/albums/userpics/DSCN1713.JPG")

Looks like a Garamond, but quite different from the Garamond I have (ITC).  
Thanks!
author: hackum

comments.content:
I think it's closer to Rotis Serif than Garamond, but it's not quite a match.

- Lex
Rotis Blob Serif. It's their latest family.

That's a new typeface for me ;)  
Thank you, I think Rotis will do.
